title: koNDADi kUttADi kandA
sahitya:
koNDADi kUttADi kandA undan vindai ninaindu magizha vENDum nAn unai


anupallavi

  cintanaiyil nidam undanai ninaindu anaittum nIyE ena terindavar pOnAlum


caraNam    vandanai seivOrkkum unnai ninaindiDAdu naDaniDuvOrkum onrupOl aruLum
vinOdanE sharavaNanE padam tandE magizhum sharavaNanE vEl vIranE ennai
